summary: This TypeScript (`.ts`) file serves as an entry point, or index file, for a module that provides access to various Spotify-related data types and functionality. The main purpose of this file is to re-export various components from separate modules, making them available for import in other parts of the application. The key functionality of this file is: 1. **Exporting Spotify Common Types**: The file exports all types and interfaces defined in the `./spotify/common` module. 2. **Exporting Spotify Artist Types**: The file exports all types and interfaces defined in the `./spotify/artist` module. 3. **Exporting Spotify Album Types**: The file exports all types and interfaces defined in the `./spotify/album` module. 4. **Exporting Spotify Track Types**: The file exports all types and interfaces defined in the `./spotify/track` module. By providing a centralized entry point, this file allows other parts of the application to import all the necessary Spotify-related data types and functionality from a single location, making the codebase more maintainable and modular.
